terms.title: Terms
terms.text:
This application must be submitted by %{applicationDueDate}.

Applicants will be contacted by the agent in the lottery rank and preference order until vacancies are filled.

All of the information that you have provided will be verified and you eligibility confirmed. Your application will be removed from the lottery if you have made any fraudulent statements, or if any household member appears on more than one application for this listing. If we cannot verify a housing lottery preference that you have claimed, you will not receive the preference but will not be otherwise penalised.

All of the information that you have provided will be verified and your eligibility confirmed. Your application will be removed from the waitlist if you have made any fraudulent statements, or if any household member appears on more than one application for this listing. If we cannot verify a housing preference that you have claimed, you will not receive the preference but will not be otherwise penalized.

Should your application be chosen from the lottery, be prepared to fill out a more detailed application and provide required supporting documents within 5 bussiness days of being contacted. For more information, please contact the developer or agent posted in the listing. Completing this lottery application does not entitle you to housing or indicate you are eligible for housing. All applicants will be screened as outlined in the property's Resident Selection Criteria.

You cannot change your online application after you submit.

I declare that foregoing is true and accurate, and acknowledge that any misstatement fraudulently or negligently made on this application will result in removal from the lottery.
terms.confirmCheckboxText: I agree and understand that I cannot change anything after I submit.
terms.agreeError: You must agree to the terms in order to continue

demographics.title: Help us ensure we are meeting our goal to serve all people.

demographics.sexualOrientationLabel: How do you describe your sexual orientation or sexual identity?

confirmation.doNotSubmitTitle: Do not submit another application for this listing.
confirmation.needToUpdate: If you need to update information on your application, do not apply again. Contact the agent if you did not receive an email confirmation.
confirmation.createAccountTitle: Would you like to create an account?

income.title: Let's move to income.
income.instruction1: Add up your total gross (pre-tax) household income from wages, benefits and other sources from all household members.
income.instruction2: You only need to provide an estimated total right now. The actual total will be calculated if you are selected.
income.prompt: What is your household total pre-tax income?
income.placeholder: Total all of your income sources
income.incomeError: Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
income.periodError: Please select one of the options above.

validationError.title: Unfortunately it appears you do not qualify for this listing.

reason.low: Your household income is too low.
reason.high: Your household income is too high.

validationError.instruction1: Please make changes if you believe you might have made a mistake. Be aware that if you falsify any information on your application you will be disqualified.
validationError.instruction2: If the information you entered is accurate, we encourage you to check back in the future as more properties become available.

vouchers.title: Do you or anyone on this application receive any of the following?

nonTaxableIncome.text: like SSI, SSDI, child support payments, or worker's compensation benefits

rentalSubsidies.text: like VASH, HSA, HOPWA, Catholic Charities, AIDS Foundation, etc.

vouchers.legend: Housing vouchers, nontaxable income or rental subsidies

whatToExpect.title: Here's what to expect from this application.
whatToExpect.info1: First we'll ask about you and the people you plan to live with. Then, we'll ask about your income. Finally, we'll see if you qualify for any affordable housing lottery preference.
whatToExpect.info2: Please be aware that each household member can only appear on one application for each listing.
whatToExpect.info3: Any fraudulent statements will cause your application to be removed.

timeout.title: Are you still working?
timeout.text: To protect your identity, your session will expire in one minute due to inactivity. You will lose any unsaved information if you choose not to respond.
timeout.afterMessage: We care about your security. We ended your session due to inactivity. Please log in or start a new application to continue.

application.deleteApplicationDescription: Deleting this application means you will lose all the information you've entered.

timeout.title: Are you still working?
timeout.text: To protect your identity, your session will expire in one minute due to inactivity. You will lose any unsaved information and be logged out if you choose not to respond.
timeout.signOutMessage: We care about your security. We logged you out due to inactivity. Please sign in to continue.

signIn.error: There was an error signing you in
signIn.errorGenericMessage: Please try again, or contact support for help.

signOut.success: You have successfully logged out of your account.

apply.applicationsMustBeReceivedByDeadline: Applications must be received by the deadline and postmarks will not be considered.
apply.applicationWillBeAvailableOn: Application will be available for download and pick up on %{openDate}
apply.dropOffApplicationOrMail: Drop Off Application or Send by US Mail
apply.paperApplicationsMustBeMailed: Paper applications must be sent by US Mail and cannot be submitted in person.
apply.postmarkedApplicationsMustBeReceivedByDa: Applications must be received by the deadline. If sending by U.S. Mail, the application must be postmarked by %{applicationDueDate} and received by mail no later than %{postmarkReceivedByDate}. Applications received after %{postmarkReceivedByDate} via mail will not be accepted even if they are postmarked by %{applicationDueDate}. %{developer} is not responsible for lost or delayed mail.

listings.availableUnitsAndWaitlistDesc: Once applicants fill all available units, additional applicants will be placed on the waitlist for %{number} units
listings.depositMayBeHigherForLowerCredit: May be higher for lower credit scores
listings.developmentalDisabilitiesDescription: A portion number of units in this building are set aside for persons with developmental disabilities. Please visit housingchoices.org for information on eligibility, requirements, how to get an application and for answers to any other questions you may have about the process.
listings.enterLotteryForWaitlist: Submit an application for an open slot on the waitlist for %{units} units.
listings.forIncomeCalculations: For income calculations, household size includes everyone (all ages) living in the unit.
listings.forIncomeCalculationsBMR: Income calculations are based on unit type
listings.moreBuildingSelectionCriteria: Find out more about Building Selection Criteria
listings.noAvailableUnits: There are no available units at this time.
listings.noOpenListings: No listings currently have open applications.
listings.occupancyDescriptionAllSro: Occupancy for this building is limited to 1 person per unit.
listings.occupancyDescriptionNoSro: Occupancy limits for this building are based on unit type.
listings.occupancyDescriptionSomeSro: Occupancy for this building varies by unit type. SROs are limited to 1 person per unit, regardless of age. For all other unit types, occupancy limits do not count children under 6.
listings.priorityUnitsDescription: This building has units set aside if any of the following apply to you or someone in your household:
listings.remainingUnitsAfterPreferenceConsiderati: After all preference holders have been considered, any remaining units will be available to other qualified applicants.
listings.reservedUnitsDescription: In order to qualify for these units one of the following must apply to you or someone in your household:

sections.rentalAssistance: Housing Choice Vouchers, Section 8 and other valid rental assistance programs will be considered for this property. In the case of a valid rental subsidy, the required minimum income will be based on the portion of the rent that the tenant pays after use of the subsidy.
sections.housingPreferencesSubtitle: Preference holders will be given highest ranking.
sections.additionalEligibilitySubtitle: Applicants must also qualify under the rules of the building.
sections.featuresSubtitle: Amenities, unit details and additional fees

listings.singleRoomOccupancyDescription: This property offers single rooms for one person only. Tenants may share bathrooms, and sometimes kitchen facilities.
listings.unitsHaveAccessibilityFeaturesFor: These units have accessibility features for people with %{type}.

upcomingLotteries.noResults: There are no closed listings with upcoming lotteries at this time.
